mapper.insert: INSERT INTO header (action, service_type, content_id, send_date, send_time) VALUES (#{action}, #{serviceType}, #{contentID}, #{sendDate}, #{sendTime})

INSERT INTO metadata (content_id, category_code, source, writer, desk_code, desk_value) VALUES (#{contentID}, #{metadata.category.code}, #{metadata.source}, #{metadata.writer}, #{metadata.desk.code}, #{metadata.desk.value})
INSERT INTO news_content (content_id, title, sub_title, comment, body) VALUES (#{contentID}, #{newsContent.title}, #{newsContent.subTitle}, #{newsContent.comment}, #{newsContent.body})
INSERT INTO append_data (content_id, mimetype, title, caption, file_name) VALUES (#{contentID}, #{appendData.mimeType}, #{appendData.title}, #{appendData.caption}, #{appendData.fileName})
